title: Network Engineer (CCNA)
qualified: Minimum Bachelor Degree (S1) for any major related to IT (Computer Science, Mathematics/Physics, Electro, Telecommunication, Informatics, Information System, etc).
Minimum has one year of working experience in related field

Familiar with Cisco technology especially in Routing Switching and Service Provider.
Have a good knowledge and conceptual in IGP (OSPF & ISIS), BGP, MPLS, L2/L3VPN and Traffic engineering.
For fresh graduate, have a good knowledge and conceptual in OSI layer and TCP/IP, network and basic routing switching.
Have a Linux skillset is an advantage.
Able to communicate in English both oral and written.

qualified: Degree in Information Technology or equivalent

Good to have experience in Fiori , PI & BOBJ
Good to have SAP Certification(s)
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
